title: Journey back
brief_description: Dramatised account of the rehabilitation of a hemiplegic patient. Deals with the cause and extent of paralysis and demonstrates the work of physical, occupational, recreational and speech therapists and their contribution to the recovery of the patient.
description: Dramatised account of the rehabilitation of a hemiplegic patient. Deals with the cause and extent of paralysis and demonstrates the work of physical, occupational, recreational and speech therapists and their contribution to the recovery of the patient.
